body:
This patch have been merged upstream: https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/commit/001a57519a7aa909d3bf0cd8c6ec8a9cd19d9c70

It is a patch to make cmake of eigen compatible with nvhpc and with all compilers that publish blank lines on the "--version" argument.

eigen detects the compiler by parsing the first line of the `--version`

I start at `3.2.6` because before the patch does not apply.
I stop at `3.3.9` because the patch is in master now.
title: eigen: Fix build with nvhpc
